publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3811.2 Euan Robson: Support for the February 15 Anti-War on Iraq Demonstration in Glasgowâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-3811) in the name of Tommy Sheridan, leave out from "agrees" to end and insert "further notes the demonstration on 15 February 2003 in Glasgow called by the Scottish Coalition for Justice Not War against attacking Iraq, and endorses the right to express opinion in peaceful protest." Supported by: Hugh Henry*, Peter Peacock*
